description:
Seedless, secure Bitcoin wallet using Threshold Signatures. 
BoldWallet is an open-source next-generation Bitcoin wallet that eliminates traditional security tradeoffs and single points of failure.
It uses Threshold Signatures (2of3) over your mobile devices â€” no internet needed for setup or signing.
